overview: Tina is an Emmy Award Winning Executive Producer and an Executive VP of content development and production at Silver Lining Productions, but mostly, she’s the heart and soul of shows like WordWorld, Nickelodeon’s Max and Ruby, and Sesame Street. With a Master’s in Education from Harvard University and over 30 years of children’s television experience, Tina is sought after for every new preschool media initiative, as she not only understands children’s television, she truly “gets” kids.
